title: mac help.... cant run lol on more than 1 user
body:
so my kid wants to start playing, so when i opened his username the lol icon was in the apps folder but wouldnt run, so i redowloaded it and it worked for him.... i went to play on my username and its doing the same thing his did, 

any suggestions...

replies.body:
Hey halagen,

This sounds incredibly odd...however, I am slightly confused due to the explanation provided.  It sounds like you are opening two different clients, when in reality, it is simply a single client.  If the client opens for your kid, and is able to enter his Username information and his password, you should be opening the same client and replacing his/her username with your own.  Are you attempting to open two different clients?  At which exact point does the client not open?

Let me know if you are still experiencing issues!

i figured this was going to confuse..... so when i start up my mac.... it stops at a username screen.  if i load my username and start the game from my username it runs fine.... if i logout of the game and logout of my username and my kid loads his username and tries to run the game nothing happens or everyonce in a while it says there is another instance of the loader running then never loads.  i know from past experience that if i redownoad the game in his username it will work, but it will make mine not work.  im assuming its a permission thing, we have the same problem with command and conquer, so i just stoped playing the game.  i dont understand why, i have quite a few programs loaded on me and they open on everyone else's username.   hope this helps.... i think this is going to confuse more....

Thanks for the reply!  I think I have a better understanding of your issue.  I believe you are referencing the Username for different profiles on your Mac OS, and not for League of Legends specifically. 

To that end, I have heard of these types of issues before where the proper permissions are not set-up on your Mac computer.  Make sure that you complete all of the steps in the following Knowledge Base Article, which should resolve this issue:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/23240853

If you are still experiencing issues, make sure that you submit a new ticket to Player Support so we can get necessary logs, and work with you on a one-on-one setting.  You can submit a ticket here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new
